name: The Sea Explorer
summary: Exploring the jaw-dropping US east coast by foot and by boat
description: Welcome to The Sea Explorer, an unforgettable adventure that will take you on a journey through some of the world's most beautiful and fascinating coastal regions. Over the course of this tour, you will have the opportunity to explore a variety of destinations, each with their own unique character and charm. From rugged cliffs and sandy beaches to bustling ports and tranquil coves, there is something for everyone. So what are you waiting for? Pack your bags and join us on this unforgettable adventure!

name: The Forest Hiker
summary: Breathtaking hike through the Canadian Banff National Park
description: Welcome to The Forest Hiker, where you'll experience the breathtaking beauty of nature on an unforgettable journey through some of the world's most spectacular forests. This tour will take you deep into the heart of nature, where you'll discover a world of ancient trees, babbling brooks, and stunning vistas. Whether you're an experienced hiker or a nature lover looking to escape the city, The Forest Hiker is the perfect way to explore the beauty and majesty of the world's forests. So lace up your boots and join us on this unforgettable adventure!

startLocation.address: 419 S Mill St, Aspen, CO 81611, USA

name: The Snow Adventurer
summary: Exciting adventure in the snow with snowboarding and skiing
description: Welcome to The Snow Adventurer, where you'll embark on an epic journey through some of the world's most breathtaking snow-covered landscapes. This tour is perfect for those who love adventure and crave the thrill of the great outdoors. Our journey will take us to some of the most stunning winter destinations in the world, where we'll ski, snowshoe, and explore our way through snow-covered mountains, forests, and valleys. Whether you're an experienced skier or a winter adventurer looking to explore the world's most beautiful snowy landscapes, The Snow Adventurer is the perfect way to experience the thrill and excitement of the great outdoors. So grab your gear and join us on this unforgettable adventure!

startLocation.address: 3663 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109, USA

name: The Park Camper
summary: Breathing in Nature in America's most spectacular National Parks
description: Welcome to The Park Camper, where you'll experience the beauty and wonder of some of the world's most stunning national parks. Our adventure will take us through breathtaking landscapes, where we'll camp under the stars, hike through stunning trails, and discover the natural wonders of the great outdoors. From towering mountains to verdant forests, we'll explore the unique ecosystems and wildlife that make these national parks so special. Whether you're an experienced camper or a nature lover looking to explore the world's most stunning wilderness areas, The Park Camper is the perfect way to experience the beauty and majesty of our national parks. So grab your gear and join us on this unforgettable adventure!

name: The City Wanderer
summary: Living the life of Wanderlust in the US' most beautiful cities
description: Welcome to The City Wanderer, where you'll explore the vibrant energy, history, and culture of some of the world's most exciting cities. This tour is perfect for those who love urban adventures and crave the excitement of exploring bustling metropolises. Our journey will take us through some of the most fascinating and dynamic cities in the world, where we'll discover unique sights, sounds, and flavors of each destination. Whether you're a seasoned traveler or a curious explorer looking to discover new cities and cultures, The City Wanderer is the perfect way to experience the energy and excitement of some of the world's most fascinating urban destinations. So join us on this unforgettable adventure and get ready to wander through the heart of the city!

name: The Sports Lover
summary: Surfing, skating, parajumping, rock climbing and more, all in one tour
description: Welcome to The Sports Lover, where you'll experience adrenaline-pumping thrills in some of the world's most stunning locations. This tour is perfect for adventure seekers who love to push themselves to their limits and explore the great outdoors. Our journey will take us to some of the world's most breathtaking locations, where we'll experience the excitement and thrills of surfing, skating, rock climbing and more. Whether you're an experienced thrill-seeker or a novice looking to experience the ultimate adventure, The Sports Lover has you covered. So what are you waiting for? Pack your gear and join us on this unforgettable journey!

name: The Star Gazer
summary: The most remote and stunningly beautiful places for seeing the night sky
description: Welcome to The Star Gazer, where you'll discover the beauty and wonder of the night sky in some of the world's most stunning locations. This tour is perfect for those who love to gaze up at the stars and marvel at the beauty of the universe. We'll take you to some of the most remote and pristine locations in the world, where you'll have the chance to see the stars in all their glory and learn about the mysteries of the cosmos from our guides. Whether you're an experienced stargazer or a novice looking to explore the wonders of the night sky, The Star Gazer is the perfect way to experience the beauty and mystery of the universe in some of the world's most stunning locations. So pack your bags and join us on this unforgettable journey!

name: The Northern Lights
summary: Enjoy the Northern Lights in one of the best places in the world
description: Welcome to The Northern Lights, where you'll get to take in the breathtaking beauty of the Aurora Borealis. Our journey will have us staying in cozy cabins in the heart of the wilderness, away from the lights, noise, and commotion of the big city. We’ll explore stunning winter landscapes, visit nearby reindeer farms, learn about local culture and traditions, and so much more. Whether you're an experienced Northern Lights chaser or a novice looking to experience the beauty of this natural wonder, Northern Lights is the perfect way to witness the awe-inspiring spectacle of the Aurora Borealis in one of the world's most stunning locations. So pack your bags and join us on this unforgettable journey!

name: The Wine Taster
summary: Exquisite wines, scenic views, exclusive barrel tastings,  and much more
description: Welcome to The Wine Taster, where you'll experience the best vineyards in some of the world’s most breathtaking locations. During our journey, we'll have the chance to meet with winemakers and experts, learn about the history and culture of wine, and taste some of the finest wines in the region. We'll also enjoy gourmet meals made with locally-sourced ingredients, and explore the stunning landscapes of the valley. Whether you're a seasoned wine connoisseur or a curious beginner, The Wine Taster is the perfect way to experience the best wine regions and vineyards in some of the world's most stunning locations. So pack your bags and join us on this unforgettable journey!
